features.Stabilization: Three axis body stabilized (zero momentum) with 4 Reactions Wheels, Magnetic torquers
features.RCS: Monopropellant Hydrazine based with sixteen 1 Newton thrusters
features.Payload: Three solid state Push Broom Cameras LlSS-1 (72.5 metre resolution), LlSS-2A and LlSS-2B (36.25 metre resolution)
features.Back to ISRO Timeline Improved features: gyro referencing for better orientation sensing, time tagged commanding (IRS-1A) facility for more flexibility in camera operation and line count information for better data product generation. Mission completed on December 20, 2003 after serving for 12 years and 4 months. ... Completes 25 Years प्रमोचन भार / Launch Mass: 975 kg शक्ति / Power: 600 W Vostok उपग्रह का प्रकार / Type of Satellite: Earth Observation निर्माता / Manufacturer: ISRO स्‍वामी / Owner: ISRO अनुप्रयोग / Application: Earth Observation कक्षा का प्रकार / Orbit Type: SSPO (Sun Synchronous Polar Orbit) Mission Operational Remote Sensing Weight 975 kg Onboard power 600 Watts Communication S-band, X-band and VHF (commanding only) Stabilization Three axis body stabilized (zero momentum) with 4 Reactions Wheels, Magnetic torquers RCS Monopropellant Hydrazine based with sixteen 1 Newton thrusters Payload Three solid state Push Broom Cameras LlSS-1 (72.5 metre resolution), LlSS-2A and LlSS-2B (36.25 metre resolution) Launch date August 29, 1991 Launch site Baikanur Cosmodrome Kazakhstan Launch vehicle Vostok Orbit 904 km Polar Sun Synchronous Inclination 99.08 o Repetivity 22 days Local time 10.30 a.m. (descending node) Mission Completed On December 20, 2003
